column2: he  accused-appellant,  had  been  indicted  on  13.05.2014  in  the  High  Court  of  Kegalle  for
the  murder  of  Wahumpurayalage  Pushpakumara  Wijekoon  on  or  about

After the trial without a Jury, the learned High Court Judge convicted the accused-appellant
and imposed death sentence on 29.11.2017. Being aggrieved by the conviction and sentence,
the accused-appellant has preferred this appeal to this court.
